test-set.name: prod-AllowingEmpty
test-set.description: Tests for the "outer for" clause - "for $x allowing empty"

test-case.name: outer-001
test-case.test: declare variable $n as xs:integer external := 10; { for $x allowing empty in 1 to $n return {$x} }

test-case.name: outer-002
test-case.test: declare variable $n as xs:integer external := 0; { for $x allowing empty in 1 to $n return {$x} }

test-case.name: outer-003
test-case.description: outer for clause with position variable
test-case.test: declare variable $n as xs:integer external := 10; { for $x allowing empty at $p in 1 to $n return {$x} }

result.assert-xml: 12345678910
